content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nI successfully executed "sudo apt-get dist-upgrade" and received an error message when attempting an unknown command. I tried to read the contents of assigned_tasks.txt using the read_file command, but received an error saying the file does not exist. However, I received a command to write to assigned_tasks.txt with a list of tasks to complete. I then received a message that the file was written to successfully. I used the read_file command to read the contents of assigned_tasks.txt and received a list of tasks to complete.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://www.learnreligions.com/martial-arts-4684481", "question": "What are some resources to learn about martial arts?"}}}'}, {'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: The text does not provide information about resources to learn about martial arts. It is a website that provides information about various religions and beliefs. \n \n Links: ['\\nHome\\n\\n\\n\\n (https://www.learnreligions.com/)', ' East Asian\\n (https://www.learnreligions.com/east-asian-4684859)', ' Taoism (Daoism)\\n (https://www.learnreligions.com/taoism-4684858)', ' Shintoism\\n (https://www.learnreligions.com/shintoism-4684855)', ' Mahayana Buddhism\\n (https://www.learnreligions.com/mahayana-buddhism-4684854)']"}]
"""
